This code clean and prepare Soil bulk density dataset

## Pacakage loading

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(vegan)
library(ggforce)
```

## Data loading

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
suelo_data <- read_csv("~/Documents/GitHub/PAELLALAB/INCREMENTO/data_prepared/abioticsoil_clean_data.csv")

# Filter by apparent_density
suelo_density<- suelo_data %>%
  filter(variable_name == "apparent_density")
# Create new column
suelo_density <- suelo_density %>%
  mutate(sampling_unit_new = paste(site,habitat, treatment, plot, sampling_unit, sep = "/"))

head(suelo_density)
```

### Data save

```{r}
write.csv(suelo_density, file = "/Users/jorgeislaescudero/Documents/GitHub/LargeHerbivoreOverabundance/data/data_for_EffectSizes/suelo.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

rm(list = ls())
